body:
Comment 5: 
https://groups.google.com/d/msg/golang-dev/gcYID6KPnXc/Hil2WBZX-7QJ

<q>
The IANA is in charge of LOTS of numbers (http://www.iana.org/protocols). If this
package doesn't have all the numbers, then it is not well named. If it does have all the
numbers, then I fear it will become unnavigable, perhaps worse even than syscall. Either
choice seems like a serious problem.
</q>
_Status changed to **WontFix**._
